Necessary Library
```{r, message= False}
library(p8105.datasets)
library(tidyverse)

library(plotly)
```

```{r}
data(instacart)

instacart%>%
  filter(aisle %in% c('fresh vegetables', 'fresh herbs', 'fresh fruits')) %>%
  group_by(aisle) %>%
  count(product_name, sort = TRUE) %>%
  top_n(3)
  
```
